Kort Alexander

              Kort Alexander
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        LinkedIn
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Email
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            I am a master’s student at the Bren School of Environmental Science and Management at UC Santa Barbara, specializing in Coastal Marine Resources Management. I am passionate about marine conservation and protecting marine ecosystems from the effects of climate change, overfishing, pollution, and coastal development worldwide.
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Kort Alexander

articles.title: Tobi Burns
articles.contents:
Kort Alexander
          
          
          Home
          About
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            Tobi Burns
          
          
            
              I am a classically trained data scientist living in the San Francisco Bay Area. Currently I work on the Oculus team at Facebook. I love talking about baseball, true crime podcasts, and causal inference.
